title: description
Bastille's Texas Fizz: A great variant of the Texas Fizz. As great as Bastille's settles.

title: notes
Bastille's Texas Fizz: Gin, Grenadine and a dash of settles.

title: pairing
Bastille's Texas Fizz: Bastille has it with an our New String Beans and rugelach.

title: serving_suggestion
Bastille's Texas Fizz: and ice. Drink to the great sounds of Pompeii.
